name: Drink Run
description:
Explore the city street and rooftops to find parts to fix your portable drink machine!

___

Controls

  • Move using WASD
  • Shoot using Left Mouse Button
  • Dash using L.Shift
  • Interact with objects using E
  • Switch gun fire settings using Right Mouse Button or Middle Mouse Button
  • Recover health with 1 after buying a health restore drink
